General.Name: Sinsin Pharmaceutical Co. Ltd
General.Description: Sinsin Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd manufactures and sells pharmaceutical products in South Korea. It offers pain relief and treatment products; insects care products; foot care products; head lice and dandruff care products; adhesive bandages; and other products. The company also exports its products to 35 countries, including the United States and Canada. Sinsin Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Sejong, South Korea.
